EmailTemplate.name: Send Profile
EmailTemplate.subject: Please find biodata of {!Profile__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi
We wish health and happiness to you and your family. We are writing this email to inform you that we have identified a suitable candidate profile for you. We attached a biodata in pdf format with photos. If you think this profile is suitable for your prospect, kindly get in touch with us. Thanks & Regards, Dhruvsoft Services Pvt. Ltd.
